title: How to Inject a Whole Chicken

steps.headline: Put all of the ingredients into a saucepan.
Bring the liquid to a boil.
Allow to cool to room temperature.
Pour the infusion into something like a tall shot glass so that the syringe will work.
Be aware that you must be very careful with the needle and do not puncture the skin.
steps.description: Your chicken will leak all of the flavorful juices out.

steps.headline: Find places where you can enter the meat without compromising the skin.
Use two full syringes for each breast.
steps.description: This will help keep your breasts from being so dry.

steps.headline: In the legs, you will need to find a point of entry at the very bottom where the feet were.
Continue infusing the chicken, until you have used all of the mixture.
steps.description: Try to share it equally on both sides of the bird.
